name: Team Up
text: When you are ganging up against an enemy, you can aid an ally with a quick feint.
prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Gang Up, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: When you and at least two of your allies are adjacent to an opponent, you can attempt the aid another action as a move action.
normal: Aid another is a standard action.
staminaText: When you and at least two of your allies are adjacent to an opponent, you can spend 2 stamina points to attempt to aid another as a swift action.
text_zh: 当你们联合起来对抗一名敌人时，你能够以快速的假动作帮助盟友。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，寓守于攻，一拥而上，BAB+6。
benefit_zh: 当你与至少两名盟友同时接临同一名敌人时，你能以移动动作尝试使用协助他人动作。
normal_zh: 协助他人是一个标准动作。
staminaText_zh: 当你和至少两个你的盟友同时邻接一个敌人时，你可以消耗2点耐力来以迅捷动作尝试援助他人。
